类型: Fit Type: 29" InseamSize: SmallColor: Grey Sage
评论详情: Okay yogis,  Some of us aren’t 23 anymore. And most yoga pants make that apparent. I dare say, not these!!  These pants hug the booty, and then drape gracefully from there, giving a more professional, mature feel. Plays down wide hips that are accentuated in most yoga pants.  I am very picky about waistbands. I can’t stand when they cut into my stomach. These do not do that. It’s very comfortable and smoothing. The back, however, has a stiff elastic in the waistband, preventing them from slipping down when doing a squat. (Elastic is 1/2” wide and terminates at side seams.) No elastic band in front.  While looking so classy, these have GREAT flexibility, so no resistance or slipping down as you move into melasana squat, tree pose, or crow pose.  I am about 5’5” and 120-130lbs. I got a small, with a 29” inseam. The back of the waistband is snug, and the length is as short as I would buy. They almost touch the ground when barefoot.  The material is so soft, and somewhere between thick and thin. Flattering yet hopefully will be alright for outdoor practice in India…  Seams are of good quality. *Doesn’t give a frontal wedgie!! Hallelujah!* Green color is accurate.  I am returning every other yoga pants I tried (I’m picky), but I am keeping these. <3  May get a second pair… May try a medium.

评论概述: Skip the search, stick to this brand!
评论详情: After endless attempts to order pants online, I had almost given up when I found this brand. They are comfortable, don’t wrinkle, a peer, professional, and most importantly-aren’t see-through when you bend over. I’ve gotten almost a dozen pairs over the last two years and they hold up for what seems to be forever. The only set I’ve retired from rotation in my work clothes were because they got paint on them, and those have still not worn out. None seem to fade or become thinner when washed. None of the others have stains or rips. If you are going to get pants online, forget the process of trying a bunch out and returning them. Stick to g4free.
